metadata.title: CVE-2020-12802 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: LibreOffice has a 'stealth mode' in which only documents from locations deemed 'trusted' are allowed to retrieve remote resources. This mode is not the default mode, but can be enabled by users who want to disable LibreOffice's ability to include remote resources within a document. A flaw existed where remote graphic links loaded from docx documents were omitted from this protection prior to version 6.4.4. This issue affects: The Document Foundation LibreOffice versions prior to 6.4.4.

criterions.comment: libreoffice package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:6.4.4-0ubuntu1').
